title: Flask of Party
summaries: The Flask of Party is one of the eight flasks that provide melee (and summoning) "bonuses" for the consumer. This particular flask provides a buff that creates confetti when the player attacks with their melee weapon or whip. This lasts for 20 / 15 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version] [img:Legacy tModLoader version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version] [img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]). The confetti created is purely cosmetic and does not provide damage bonuses.
